question: Which of the following is Indiaâ€™s first Credit Information Company?
explanation: Credit Information Bureau Limited (CIBIL) is the first Credit Information Company in India. It was founded in August 2000. CIBIL was promoted by State Bank of India (SBI), Housing Development Finance Corporation (HDFC), Dun & Bradstreet Information Services India Private Limited (D&B) and TransUnion International Inc.
